content.description:
Pretty standard bullet gray slab climb for the area, with some interesting flaring crack features.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.location: Cross the creek wherever looks good to you on the east side of The Alien. Find a faint trail angling uphill and right, which gets more obvious as it cuts back left. Gain the crest, and make your way back down the west side for about 100 feet, until you come across the small, bullet gray NW facing slab. Belay at waist high bolt.

content.description:
Fairly typical slab climbing for the area, with some steeper, blocky moves up top.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.location: Cross the creek wherever looks good to you on the East side of The Alien. Find a faint trail angling uphill and right, which gets more obvious as it cuts back left. Gain the crest on the north side of the Alien, and make your way back down down the West side for about 100 feet until you come across the small, bullet gray NW facing slab. Belay at waist high bolt.
